staxel.village.dialogue.ShyPrimary.line:: (안함)R...really? You think so...?
(안함)Do you...do you think you'd be interested in helping? I'm...not much of a builder...
(안함)Of course!
(안함)Maybe some other time.
(안함)Well...maybe I'll put a bit more thought into it...
(안함)Thank you ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I...I knew I could count on you!
(안함)This...this should be all you need to get started...
(안함)I...I know it isn't much, but I can give you some funds too...
(안함)Oh... Well...
(안함)In that case, I guess I'll have to put that on hold...
(안함)...I'll be here if you change your mind...
(안함)How is the ^c:1486b0;pet store^c:pop; coming along?
(안함)I...I hope when it's done it'll make all the pets happier...
(안함)We can save the abandoned animals too...!
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! You...you have to help...!
(안함)There's a...a ^c:1486b0;stray cat^c:pop; I've seen around the village a bit...
(안함)It's not looking too well...
(안함)We...we need to find it and rescue it! What if someone accidentally sweeps it...?
(안함)Could you see if you can find it?
(안함)Did...did you find it yet?
(안함)We shouldn't waste any time...
(안함)You...you found it?
(안함)But you say it...ran away?
(안함)What if...you try to befriend it? Maybe give it a gift...?
(안함)Did you befriend it yet...?
(안함)I think...it might like what usual cats do...
(안함)You...you managed to get it?
(안함)That's a relief...
(안함)I really need to take a proper look at some of those injuries...
(안함)I...I really appreciate the help, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;.
(안함)There aren't many like you around...
(안함)If...if there's anything I can do...?
(안함)I'd love a rabbit!
(안함)Rabbits? I...I'll have to think about it...
(안함)Give me some time...
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;... I saw the ^c:1486b0;pet store^c:pop;...
(안함)It...it's perfect!
(안함)I know it's not really enough...but this is the only way I can compensate you right now...
(안함)I hope you stop by the store soon...
(안함)Oh, hi ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
(안함)So... I...I've been thinking...
(안함)You have a pet, right? Some of the other residents have in the past too...
(안함)I... I've seen travelling merchants with pets too sometimes.
(안함)So I was thinking... What if I opened a...^c:1486b0;pet store^c:pop;?
(안함)That sounds like a great idea!
(안함)Not sure there's a market, really.
(안함)Ah, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
(안함)I...I didn't see you walk up...
(안함)I've been...I've been thinking a lot about rabbits recently.
(안함)But I'm not sure I want to talk about it right now...
(안함)Maybe if you come back tomorrow...?
(안함)You know, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
(안함)I had a rabbit once. A little brown ball of fluff...
(안함)But...
(안함)Two days after we brought it home, it stopped moving.
(안함)Just like that. No warning. Nothing.
(안함)It was...too much for my younger self...
(안함)I'm...I'm not sure I want to risk exposing anyone else to something like that...
(안함)I'm sorry, ^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;...
(안함)I...think it's for the best...
(안함)That way, no one needs to suffer...
(안함)Hmm? You...you heard something about ^c:1486b0;Lilly^c:pop;...?
(안함)...it was already sick?
(안함)Are...are you sure about that?
(안함)I...I think I need to look into this a bit.
(안함)Can you give me some time perhaps?
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! I really hoped I'd run into you...
(안함)I thought about things a lot. More than I expected to...
(안함)And... I decided to try again.
(안함)I...I don't know how to thank you.
(안함)I'd never have found these things out on my own...
(안함)It...it feels good to finally have proper closure. I didn't even know I needed it...
(안함)I know this is nothing—not nearly enough to thank you...
(안함)...but I hope it at least expresses some of my thanks...
(안함)Come play with ^c:1486b0;Poopsy^c:pop; sometimes...okay?
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}^c:pop;! It...it's happened again...
(안함)I knew this would happen...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Poopsy^c:pop; is sick...
(안함)Did I...did I do something wrong?
(안함)He just doesn't seem to want to eat or anything...
(안함)Is there...anything you can do? Do you think ^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; might know...?
(안함)Could you ask him for me? I...I don't want to leave right now...
(안함)You...want me to explain what's wrong?
(안함)He's been very withdrawn... He always hides away in corners...
(안함)He doesn't follow me around the same way any more...
(안함)He hasn't touched his food in days...
(안함)I...I don't know what to do...
(안함)If it were any other animal I might know how to treat him...
(안함)I...I might not know much about caring for rabbits...
(안함)But I can tell that's not the right solution...
(안함)It doesn't match the symptoms...
(안함)He's been very withdrawn... He always hides away in corners...
(안함)He doesn't follow me around the same way any more...
(안함)He hasn't touched his food in days...
(안함)I...I don't know what to do...
(안함)Did...did you go out and find another rabbit for me?
(안함)But...
(안함)^c:1486b0;Leif^c:pop; said it's loneliness? That another rabbit would help?
(안함)...I suppose it's worth trying at least...
(안함)Maybe if we wait a few days he'll start to improve?
(안함)^c:1486b0;{0-playername}!^c:pop; He got better!
(안함)It really was loneliness! The two of them have been playing together all day!
(안함)His appetite is back to normal and he's not as withdrawn any more!
(안함)I...I can't think of a way to thank you properly...
(안함)This is more than anyone has done for me before...
(안함)You...you really went above and beyond.
(안함)Thank you for doing so much for me...
(안함)It's just a pity we live so far apart...
(안함)I...think it might be too early to tell...
(안함)We should give them a little bit more time...
